Knowledge Sharing on An Analytical Study of Leg Joint Synergy in Bipedalism
===========================================================================

by [commpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/commpic/ "Posts by commpic")
 | Mar 5, 2017 | [COMM](https://fke.utm.my/category/comm/)

Advanced Telecommunication Technology (ATT) Research Group will be organizing a knowledge sharing session by Dr. Kaichida Shoko from National Institute of Technology (NIT), Kagoshima College, Japan. The title of the talk is “An Analytical Study of Leg Joint Synergy in Bipedalism.”

Details of the event are as follow:

Date: 8 March 2017 (Wednesday)

Time: 9.30 am

Venue: P19a, Level 4, Bilik Tutorial 5

We are pleased to invite lecturers, researchers and students to join. Don’t miss the opportunity and see you there!
